alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 19 at 3:21AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Gulf, Wakulla, southeastern Liberty, southern Leon and Franklin Counties through 415 AM EST/315 AM CST/... At 321 AM EST/221 AM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles west of Crawfordville, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, Eastpoint, Apalachicola, Woodville, Crawfordville, Tallahassee, Franklin, Sopchoppy, Jewel Fire Tower, Shadeville, Leon Sinks, Royal Bluff, Wakulla Springs, Eight Mile Pond, Beverly, Poplar Camp, Bloxham, Bethel, Curtis Mill and Fort Gadsden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty
